Daily Basque Vocab: Your Simple Path to Basque Mastery
Boost your Spanish vocabulary with ease! This streamlined Chrome extension delivers:

10 new Basque-to-English word translations daily
Clean, distraction-free interface
Automatic updates - no effort required

Expand your Basque knowledge effortlessly as you browse. Perfect for beginners and intermediate learners looking for consistent, bite-sized language practice.
